title: Requirements Engineering: Secure Software
creator: University of Colorado
description: Description: This specialization is intended for software engineers, development and product managers, testers, QA analysts, product analysts, tech writers, and security engineers. Even if you have experience in the requirements realm, this course will expand your knowledge to include new viewpoints, development styles, techniques and tools.

title: Software Product Management Specialization
creator: Kenny Wong
description: Create Better Software using Agile Practices. Master Agile development and effective interactions to drive the making of great software products

title: Next.js + React.js tutorial
creator: LearnCode.academy
description: Next.js should be your go-to for any React.js work these days.  If you're using Create React App...STOP! You're missing out on the joys of Next.js. This tutorial covers Next.js for building React.js apps, websites, blogs.  Almost web development you do with React will benefit from Next.js.

title: Responsive Design Tutorial
creator: LearnCode.academy
description: Responsive Design makes a website look amazing on any device. Using css media queries, good flexbox/grid layouts, srcset, and html5 picture tags, we can convert our website into a fully responsive site. Learn how its done.

title: Complete Guide to Build IOT Things
creator: Junaid Ahmed
description: Build IOT products using Arduino, NodeMCU,ESP8266, IOT Platforms, Sensors, Displays, Keypads,Relays, PCB's,Casing & more
